segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, quite busy in its detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that one task, her hands moving with practiced ease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice a steady stream of water gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is clearly full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is actually spilling over the front edge, forming a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor right where her foot is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains utterly calm and unchanged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems entirely oblivious to the growing flood around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how unaware she is of the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting larger with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe her concentration is that absolute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a remarkable display of focus, even if misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water will certainly damage the cabinets soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
